title: Finding out how much money i have spent
body:
So, i emalied riot a few days ago, looking to find out how much money i have spent on the game, you know, just for fun.

Anywho i was asked for several things, most of them being  reasonable such as payment methods and IP address. And then i got the oh so lovely question of first 5 champions E V E R purchased on this account and the first RP item purchased. Now, this is absolutely mind boggling, i have had this account for 3+ years, and i am expected to remember that just off the top of my head? there is no way for you to find this information out, you just have to be lucky enough to remember. Finding out how much money you have spent on the game isn't "sensitive information" i don't care what they say. It's not like someone will see how much money i've spent and have access to my account. Does anyone have a solution for this, like is riot intelligent enough to leave in a way to find out the first 5 champions i ever bought 3 years ago?

replies.body: 220$, I've never heard of that currency. How does it fare against the US$ ? Might consider investing.

I had the same questions when I was locked out of boards. Had account since like 2009 and they want me to remember first 5 champs. Absolute joke of an id question.

 taking the piss.
Lol wtf that's so stupid. I can remember I played teemo.. cho and kog but who knows that shit. I only reemember because I loved the bug characters
